bill_title: consider the value of certain insurance checks when calculating the purchase price of a motor vehicle.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to consider the value of certain insurance checks when calculating the purchase price of a motor vehicle. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 32-5B be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: For the purpose of § 32-5B-4, if a motor vehicle is destroyed to the extent that it constitutes a total loss of the vehicle, the value of any check from an insurance company which is intended to cover the loss of the vehicle may be considered as a credit or trade-in when determining the purchase price of a motor vehicle. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
